context: Hey there. : ) I'm doing ood. good
Can you recommend some movies to watch?
I've been looking around at some good Culinary films.
I'll watch anything that is good ok. That's different what do you have in mind?
One of my faves is Julie & Julia (2009) It's about the famous cook Julia Child.
ok. I'll add that to my list I know who she is. Seen her a couple of times on TV
Also, how could I not mention Ratatouille (2007) ? It's about a mouse.
lol. haven't seen it yet check what else do you have in mind?
Another good comedy is The Search for General Tso (2014)
No, it's a movie about the history of General Tso.
resp: Another good Indie one is Today's Special (2009)
